wikipedia_page.main: Frances Leighton also known as Fran Leighton (born 30 March 1982) is a British water polo player. She competed for Great Britain in the women's tournament at the 2012 Summer Olympics. This was the first ever Olympic GB women's water polo team.

link_mentions.page: Water polo at the 2003 World Aquatics Championships – Women's team rosters

response: * Frances Leighton (born 1982), British water polo player
